item.title: Minimal Setup A Vue App Project
item.description: Pre-request Have vue-cli installed npm install @vue/cli -g Create Project vue create prj-name The default preset (babel, eslint) installes 178MB. with route/vuex 183MB Start run/development npm run serve common modules vue add router vue add vuex Configure You don’t need to config and the boilplate just works. However if you do need extra configuration, create vue.config.js at project root folder. module.exports = { // configures go here devServer: { proxy: 'http://localhost:8088', // alternatively, if you have multiple APIs // or fine-tune url pattern // proxy: { // 'api-url': { // target: 'http://localhost:8088', // ws: true, // also websockets // changeOrigin: true, // }, // 'other-api-url: {.
